objectDesc.p: Papyrus, 10.4x9.6 (?), 1 extant leaf(s), 1 column(s), 7 (?) line(s) per column, 20 characters per line, written in Greek.

history.provenance: Obtained by Fundación Sant Lluc Evangelista (Foundation of Saint Luke Evangelist) at Barcelona, España.
Transferred 1997 to Abadía de Monserrat (Abbey of Montserrat) at Barcelona, España.

msIdentifier.msName: P.Monts.Roca inv. 83, Abadía de Monserrat (Abbey of Montserrat), Barcelona, España.

sourceDesc.bibl: Roca–Puig, R., “Papiro del evangelio de San Juan con 'Hermeneia'”, Atti dell' XI Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia, p. 226-236, Istituto Lombardo di Scienze e Lettre: Milano, Italia, 1966. OCLC 1913023.
